A, B = map(int, input().split())
print(A - B if A > B else 0)


A, B = map(int, input().split())
print(A - B if B <= A else 0)


A, B = map(int, input().split())

print(A - B if A >= B else B - A)

A, B = map(int, input().split())

print(A - B if A > B else B - A)

import sys

def main():
    a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(abs(a-b))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
